name: Preply - Mobile UX Writer Test Task
description:
Background:

Product stakeholders and the Mobile Acquisition team app want to increase the rate at which users who download the app convert to students taking a trial lesson. They think the Preply app is missing instant gratification that some competitors provide.


They believe that matching students with a tutor and giving them a short free lesson during their first time using the app will encourage students to become regular, paying customers and take more lessons.


Your challenge: 

Create wireframes with mid-fi copy for an instant lessons flow, starting after the student chooses the language they’re learning:

  • Setting expectations that they will connect with a tutor for a short trial lesson
  • Leading them to enter their payment info and start a free trial
  • Connecting them with the tutor via video call


Together with your proposed solution, please give a brief explanation of what went into it:

  1. The thinking and reasoning behind your choices
  2. References or competitor benchmarking
  3. How you would measure the impact of the solution
  4. Any tech limitations that you considered in your solution


The designer on the team has gathered some mockups of the flow that new students now experience, along with some assets that show a rough outline of the instant experience we’d like to provide. See them in Figma or view the attached PNGs. 


More details:

What we’re offering students:

  • Trial period (1 day): one free 15-min lesson, 1-on-1 with a tutor. They can connect instantly after they provide their payment info.
  • Subscription (4 weeks): one weekly 30-min lesson, 1-on-1 with a tutor. $5 per lesson billed every 4 weeks ($20). Can be cancelled any time.


About our audience:

  • We serve language learners from around the world. They have a variety of goals, but share a desire to speak confidently. Some of the top reasons for learning on Preply are for career/business, moving or traveling to a new country, learning conversational skills, preparing for a language exam, and lessons for kids.


About our brand:

  • Preply is positioning itself as an effective, motivating and human solution for learning languages. We add value to the learning process as a personal language coach.


About our tone, voice and style:

  • Preply voice is friendly, trustworthy, confident, motivational and optimistic but not formal, pushy, serious, disrespectful or bland. Our tone changes depending on the situation, but it's generally informal. 
  • Many of our customers use our product in a language they don’t speak natively. To help them understand our writing, we aim for simplicity and clarity.
